trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> objects.
This class cannot be inherited.
This class implements the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataCollection"></xref> class.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataCollection"></xref> class and adds an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> object to the collection.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> object to add to the collection.
Adds an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> object to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataCollection"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> object to add to the collection.
The index of the added <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> object.
asnEncodedData is `null`.
One of the OIDs is `null` and the OIDs do not match.
Copies the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataCollection"></xref> object into an array.
This method copies the contents of an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection> object into an array.
The copying begins at the specified index location.
The array that the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataCollection"></xref> object is to be copied into.
The location where the copy operation starts.
Gets the number of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> objects in a collection.
Use this property to determine how many <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> objects the collection contains.
The number of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> objects.

Returns an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator"></xref> object that can be used to navigate the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataCollection"></xref> object.
The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator> class implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface, which allows you to move within a collection.
An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator"></xref> object.
Gets a value that indicates whether access to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataCollection"></xref> object is thread safe.
This collection is not thread safe.
`false` in all cases.
Gets an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataCollection"></xref> object.
Use this method to retrieve an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> object from an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataCollection> object, if you know its location.
The location in the collection.
An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> object.
Removes an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataCollection"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> object to remove.
asnEncodedData is `null`.
Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataCollection"></xref> object.
<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataCollection> is not thread safe.
Derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataCollection> using this property.

The synchronizing code must perform operations on the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataCollection.SyncRoot%2A> property of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataCollection> class, not directly on the class itself.
This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects.
Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataCollection> object.
An object used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataCollection"></xref> object.
Copies the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataCollection"></xref> object into an array.
This method copies the contents of an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataCollection> object into an array.
The copying begins at the index location specified.
The array that the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataCollection"></xref> object is to be copied into.
The location where the copy operation starts.
The length for index is invalid.
array is `null`.
The length for index is out of range.

Returns an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator"></xref> object that can be used to navigate the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataCollection"></xref> object.
The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator> class implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface, which allows you to move within a collection.
An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator"></xref> object that can be used to navigate the collection.
